comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Giovanni Martinelli: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Giovanni_Martinelli His wife was named Adele Previtali; their elder daughter Bettina was born in 1915, so she's either pregnant or just postpartum when this photo was taken, which might explain her roomy big coat.

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: He appeared in the Met's productions of Madama Butterfly, Aida and Il Trovatore, in the 1915-1916 season. 69.18.170.204/archives/frame.htm

comment.author: 34911459@N08
comment._content: Thanks for the additional information.  We will update the record.
